The Meeting Toolbar

See memetic for full details on the purpose of the meeting toolbar.


Figure 1. The Meeting Toolbar


Toolbar option

Allows you to

  Start

Start recording or replaying a Compendium mapping session (when used for a meeting on the Access Grid) depending on the current map open.

If the current map is a meeting map, which has not been recorded, recording will start (if all the correct setup detail are there).

if the current map is a meeting map which has been recorded, replay will be initialized (if all the correct setup details are there).

If this is not a meeting map, the Meeting Recorder dialog will be opened.
  Pause The will pause the saving of meeting event data, and then resume saving meeting event data when you un-pause by pressing the button again.
  Stop This will stop, either the recording of the meeting or the replaying of the meeting depending which you are doing.
  Upload This will open a dialog that will allow you to upload data to the Access Grid triplestore database which has previously been saved to a local file.
